creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: square white plastic calendar; numbers on round yellow, orange, and magenta plastic chip with small tabs; oval window below numbers for day; round cutout at LR for month; wrapped in plastic and comes in original box
image_copyright: © Minol Araki%2C licensed by David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
text: The two desk calendars here were some of the earliest products sold by PIPa, a design studio for high-end housewares headquartered in New York that Araki established in the late 1960s.
title: Perpetual Desk Calendar
